turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi how are you doing today

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm doing good. How are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am doing wonderful, thank you for asking. I have a question, have you ever donated to a charity before?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes. I live in an area that sometimes has flooding and also live in the part of the country that is referred to as "Tornado Alley". I\'ve donated to American Red Cross and some local charities.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I understand. I live in an area prone to hurricanes. Mother nature has been a little temperamental these past few years. Have you ever heard of a charity called Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I've never been in a hurricane and would rather not. Agreed it's been rough lately. Yes I've heard of Save the Children. They've seen them on TV before.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, hurricanes can be dreadful, tornadoes as well. Save the Children is an amazing charity that I'm collecting donations for today. I personally feel like it's our moral obligation to make sure that all children are well taken care of. Don't you agree?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I totally agree. They weren't asked to be put in the position in which they live and feel that people should do as much as they can if they are able to help anybody out.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are so right! Sadly many children are subjected to violence or are living on the streets starving and sick. You said you had seen a commercial. What about it appealed to you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Just showing the general public the conditions in which some have to live in. There's a lot of people that have no clue of how poor some countries are and the conditions in which people have to live in.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's one of the amazing things about Save the Children. We are a global charity, offering food, clean water, educational material, and vaccines to children that need it most. Our website offers much education to the public about living conditions and the negative things that affect these innocent children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's awesome that they are global. What people don't realize about donation is that with some of them like Save the Children just a few pennies can do so much. There's people that don't donate just because they have no idea just how little it takes and where their money goes.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Exactly! Most people spend countless amounts of money on wasted product or food when something as small as $1.00 can benefit one of these children. Did you know that in the first two months of this year, 1,000 children were reported killed or injured in Syria. That's so heartbreaking and it angers me. How does it make you feel?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It upsets me a great deal. I think that it's hideous that these innocent people are being killed over most of the time generally hasnothing to do with them.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I completely agree. Save the Children is also known for providing children who live in hazardous conditions such as war zones with more security and safety. If more people in this world felt like you and I, I believe all children would have a better chance at life, don't you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Absolutely! Children are the future of this world and unfortunately are the ones that end up hurt in the long run

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree wholeheartedly! How much would you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all of your payment, $2?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to donate $0.50 to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is amazing! Thank you so much. That money will go a long way for a child in need. You are a hero!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Your welcome. I appreciate the opportunity to donate to a good cause.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: And the cause appreciates people like you!
